mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice ( title, content, image ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{image} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, reg_date, image FROM notice WHERE ID=#{id}

SELECT id, title, content, reg_date, image FROM notice WHERE 1=1
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
ORDER BY ID desc LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM notice WHERE 1=1
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
